categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The attack on Parozha VII was carried out in around 5 ABY by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. The fighter wing's squadrons Two, Three and Four swarmed the Parozha VII supply space station, which formally supplied the Empire but had since turned to the New Republic, and destroyed the docked starships. The cargo bays were then blasted open by the 204th squadrons, suffocating the inhabitants and ejecting the cargo, which was collected by the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Edict through the vessel's tractor beam.
The attack on Parozha VII was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
